All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActuatorConfig
A configuration class that activates the httpExchanges actuator.
Bid
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Bid.
BidController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Bids.
BidService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Bid before calling the repository.
CurvePoint
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) CurvePoint.
CurvePointController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the CurvePoints.
CurvePointService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO CurvePoint before calling the repository.
ErrorControllerImpl
A class that implements ErrorController, a native SpringBoot class.
HandlerInterceptorImpl
A class that implements WebMvcConfigurer, a native Spring MVC class.
HomeController
A class that receives the request default URL request.
IBidRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal queries relative to Bid entities.
IBidService
BidService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
ICurvePointRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal queries relative to CurvePoint entities.
ICurvePointService
CurvePointService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.

Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal queries relative to Rating entities.
IRatingService
RatingService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.

IRuleNameService
RuleNameService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.

Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal queries relative to Trade entities.
ITradeService
TradeService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
IUserRepository
Repository interface which extends the JPA (Jakarta Persistence API) Repository in order to deal queries relative to User entities.
IUserService
UserService interface that abstracts it from its implementation in order to achieve better code modularity in compliance with SOLID principles.
PoseidonApplication
The main class of the application.
Rating
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Rating.
RatingController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Rating.
RatingService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Rating before calling the repository.
RuleName
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) RuleName.
RuleNameController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the RuleNames.
RuleNameService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO RuleName before calling the repository.
SpringSecurityConfig
A configuration class that contains 5 Beans for configuring SpringSecurity to encode passwords with BCrypt and route users according to their level of accreditation.
Trade
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) Trade.
TradeController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Trades.
TradeService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO Trade before calling the repository.
UriToIgnore
Constants class that regroups a short list of URI that the logger should ignore.
User
A model class which creates the POJO (Plain Old Java Object) User.
UserController
A class that receives requests made from some of the usual CRUD endpoints and specific URL for the Users.
UserDetailsServiceImpl
A class that implements UserDetailsService, a native SpringBoot class used to retrieve username, password and role for authentication.
UserService
A service class which performs the business processes relating to the POJO User before calling the repository.
WebMvcConfigurerImpl
A class that implements WebMvcConfigurer, a native Spring MVC class.
